name: 2024 Int’l Conference on Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution
content: 2024 Int’l Conference on Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution (PGTD 2024) will be held during April 19-21, 2024 in Xiamen, China. This Conference will cover issues on Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution, and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
